summary: The Ring of Nighteye is finaly avaviable to the inhabitants of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Ring of Nighteye

The Ring of Nighteye is finally available to the inhabitants of Skyrim. The ring can be bought from Farengar the Court Wizard in Dragonsreach in Whiterun.  
The ring can be disenchanted at a enchanting table. 

Works with Mtsaint\'s Unlimited Rings. 
Also recommend Jazko\'s Night Eye Blur Removal available on Steam Workshop.   

Install:
Copy the Ring of Nighteye.esp to your Skyrim data folder, usually located in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim.
author: NottingHillbillie
